FAQs

Are you a dine-in restaurant?

No, we are a cloud kitchen optimized for delivery only.

Do you do bulk/group orders?

Yes! Please contact us via WhatsApp for large orders.

Where do you deliver?

We deliver across Nairobi via our delivery partners (Glovo/Uber Eats) and direct dispatch.
